attributes.additional_details: The evidence for this petition is in our sales performance against other stores. This has not been thought out properly and I don't except the decision of Tesco plc
attributes.background: The retail giant Tesco claim to be acting in the interests of their customers. However, despite good sales figures they are taking away a much needed retail commodity after being partly complicit in the closure of the high street fishmonger shop.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition as the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be the responsibility of Tesco.
